name: Swarm of Insects
description: A buzzing, crawling mass of small creatures such as beetles, ants, or wasps. The swarm can strip vegetation or flesh in moments.
memorable: Overwhelms opponents with sheer numbers and venomous bites.
goals: To overwhelm prey by biting and stinging in large numbers.
relations: Can appear with other insect swarms or nature-based creatures.
environment: Typically found in jungles, forests, or deserts.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage; immune to various conditions.
weaknesses: Very low Strength and Intelligence make it ineffective in physical confrontations beyond its bites.
attacks: Bites and Venom attacks inflict piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Swarm ability allows it to occupy spaces of other creatures and move through tiny openings.
senses: Possesses blindsight within 10 feet for sensing nearby creatures.
skills: Very low passive perception of 8, indicating poor awareness.
additional_information: May include variations like beetles, centipedes, spiders, or wasps.
Can deal damage even when bloodied, maintaining potency in combat.
Can maneuver through tight spaces, making it difficult to trap.
Inflicts poison damage, which complicates encounters.
Composed of several small creatures acting as one.
test_queries: insect swarm in jungles and forests
biting swarm that can occupy spaces
